p:
From the λ value determined by the fitting, other parameters can be estimated. I assume that parameters do not change unless effective measures are introduced. First I set
γ = 0.03
in the entire period assuming that the recovery time of infected at large is 33 days. Here I took a longer period among widely distributed observations ( Backer et al., 2020; He et al., 2020; Housen et al., 2020). Next, I set
q = 0
in the first period since virtually no infecteds were quarantined in this period. The estimated values for
β N
and q are listed in Table 1.
